name: spew
description: Crawls your feeds into bookmarks and provides a hotkey to open a few in tabs. That's it!
author: Kartik Agaram

preferences.name: READ_HOTKEY
preferences.title: Read hotkey
preferences.description: Hotkey for opening some stories to read. ctrl is 'accel'. Restart your browser if you change this.

preferences.name: TABS_AT_A_TIME
preferences.title: Stories to read at a time
preferences.description: Number of stories/tabs to open everytime you hit your hotkey.
